memory: ^You are a babysitter for a very interesting family. The mother told you to keep an eye on only one of the two kids you were assigned to watch. She did not specify which kid to watch so that means you get to pick!
house: ^Now that you have picked your kid to watch you should probably follow them into the kitchen because they are hungry. Grab some bread and make a sandwhich with the stuff in the fridge!
bread: ^ a delicious turkey ham sandwhich with the bread you got.
^ wants to go to their room now and play Gorilla Tag. You must still keep an eye on
room: ^ play gorrilla tag for 5 hours! Talk about commitment! The mom has returned home and you can now leave. Congrats you are a true babysitter!
pasta: ^ asked for, in fact they hate it! What a terrible babysitter you must be. Your fired!
beer: ^ is starting to feel drunk and the other child has called the police. You grasp the thought of going to jail within the first 5 minutes of you being in the house.
jail: ^Zoinks you dont have your ID on you, silly babysitter. What age should you say you are to the officer questioning you?

c-1: ^. Hopefully they dont find out you are a 32 year old tehee! Now they want to take your mugshot time to turn that frown upside down!!

photo: ^You now have an awkward smile and an additional charge of providing an officer with an age that isnt yours. Now rot!
car: ^Phew that was a close one. You took the easy way out and now its time to change your identity. You dissapear wihtout a trace and realize you got paid 50 dollars to give
